title: Slice of Pizza

adjectives: Having or showing good taste; tasteful.
Extremely pleasing to the sense of taste
verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
nouns: Pizza is an oven-baked flat bread typically topped with tomato sauce and cheese.
A single instance of this dish
Italian dish made of oven-baked bread with various toppings
Italian open pie made of thin bread dough spread with a spiced mixture of e.g. tomato sauce and cheese
Oven specifically constructed to bake pizzas.
Dough made of flour, water, yeast and sometimes salt, olive oil and sugar which is used to bake pizzas.
A prebaked and deep-frozen pizza that is rebaked in the oven.
An oven-baked flatbread covered with tomato sauce and additional toppings.
A pizza.
A solid food prepared from the pressed curd of milk
A dairy product made from curdled or cultured milk.
A curdled or cultured milk product.
Generic term for a diverse group of milk-based food products
Cheese is a food derived from milk that is produced in a wide range of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A slice of pepperoni pizza, previously also topped with black olives on Google. WhatsApp adds green pepper, Samsung white onion.
apple_vendor_description: The pizza emoji on Apple devices is a delectable slice rendered with mouthwatering detail, showcasing a golden-brown crust and a generous topping of melted cheese and pepperoni. Apple's realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading make the toppings appear almost edible, with glistening highlights on the cheese. The soft, rounded edges of the crust and the vibrant colors contribute to its appealing and universally recognized depiction of a delicious treat, commonly used to express hunger, cravings, or sharing a meal.
